title: The Dan Patrick Show-BEST OF-for Aug 10, 2020
itunes:title: The Dan Patrick Show-BEST OF-for Aug 10, 2020
description:
Dan Patrick breaks major news about the College Football season. Sports Illustrated's Pat Forde joins us to break down the College Football landscape, TNT's Chris Haynes joins the show from the bubble, and Fox Sports' Joel Klatt calls in. Plus, Fritzy doubles down on being a cheater.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
